title: Autoworkers Prepare to Strike for a Place in the EV Future
description: Some 150,000 US autoworkers are poised to strike this week for better pay. Their union is pushing auto giants to ensure that green jobs won’t be worse jobs.

title: How to Take Back the Internet
description: Cory Doctorow talks about everything that threatens to make the internet “a toxic waste dump”—and the ways you can regain control of your choices online.

title: The US Congress Has Trust Issues. Generative AI Is Making It Worse
description: Senators are meeting with Silicon Valley's elite to learn how to deal with AI. But can Congress tackle the rapidly emerging tech before working on itself?

title: The iPhone 15 Opts for Intuitive AI, Not Generative AI
description: Apple ignored the tech industry's obsession with generative AI at the new iPhone launch, offering subtler AI features that make everyday tasks like photography and phone calls better.

title: The AI Hype Train Has Stalled in China
description: Chinese artificial intelligence startups say uncertain regulation, chip shortages, and a slowing economy will make it tough to compete.

title: EV Mania Hasn't Killed Hunger for Hybrid Trucks
description: For environmentalists, hybrid vehicles can feel like a compromise. But demand for hybrid pickup trucks is surging—and they may be the greenest practical option.
